itunes:title: Episode 742 - Special Guest Former Delta Force SGT. Major Tom Satterly
title: Episode 742 - Special Guest Former Delta Force SGT. Major Tom Satterly
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former Delta Operator Tom Satterly to talk about his experiences fighting in the battle portrayed in ‘Black Hawk Down’ as well as his role in capturing Saddam Hussein, Satterly’s charity All Secure Foundation...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former Delta Operator Tom Satterly to talk about his experiences fighting in the battle portrayed in ‘Black Hawk Down’ as well as his role in capturing Saddam Hussein, Satterly’s charity All Secure Foundation, which helps former Special Operations veterans deal with PTSD and the difficulties of getting back into civilian life, his own struggles after leaving the military, and his book All Secure.
